00019 #include <iostream>
00020 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/property_tree/xml_parser.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include "FFTProcessorToBC.hpp"
00024 #include "network/client.hpp"
00025 #include "network/iq_adapter.hpp"
00026 #include "processor/registry.hpp"
00027 #include "repack_processor.hpp"
00028 #include "run.hpp"
00029 
00039 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00040 {
00041   // set up command-line options
00042   boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00043   try {
00044     vm = process_options("config/FFTProcessor.xml", argc, argv);
00045   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00046     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00047     return 1;
00048   }
00049 
00050   boost::filesystem::path p(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00051   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", p.stem().native());
00052   try {
00053     // read the XML initialization file
00054     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00055     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config, boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00056 
00057     // register FFT processors
00058     processor::registry::add<FFTProcessorToBC<float>  >("FFTProcessorToBC_FLOAT");
00059     processor::registry::add<FFTProcessorToBC<double> >("FFTProcessorToBC_DOUBLE");
00060 
00061     // connect to DataIQ stream
00062     const std::string stream_name("DataIQ");
00063     network::client::client<network::iq_adapter<repack_processor<FFTProcessorToBC<double> > > >
00064       c(config.get_child("FFTProcessor"));
00065 
00066     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00067     if (streams.find(stream_name) != streams.end())
00068       ASSERT_THROW(c.connect_to(stream_name) == true);
00069     else
00070       throw std::runtime_error(str(boost::format("stream '%s' is not available")
00071                                    % stream_name));
00072     // start
00073     c.start();
00074 
00075     // run until a signal is caught
00076     run_in_thread(network::get_io_service());
00077   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00078     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00079     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00080     return 1;
00081   }
00082   return 0;
00083 }
